description: http://anidb.net/ch16491 [Youta]`s classmate Moemi is a beautiful girl hopelessly in love with http://anidb.net/ch16492 [Takeshi], the idol of many girls at their school. Being completely unaware of Youta`s feeling for her she frequently asks the boy for encouragement and advice (such as which kind of present she should choose for Takeshi, going to such lengths as skipping class together for this purpose).
name: Hayakawa Moemi
